name: BlueSapling Technologies
description:
BlueSapling is a technology company, consulting clients globally and transforming their businesses with intelligent enterprise software. We have experience developing systems for industries like apparel manufacturing, international trade, e-commerce, retail, and others.
 
We specialise and have a lot of experience in building cloud-based enterprise software using Ruby on Rails web framework. Enterprise software built by us are running businesses with multi-million dollar turnovers. We also do business consulting, web-development, mobile development and data analytics.
 
BlueSapling was founded in late 2015 by Rajveer Shekhawat who is a graduate of one of the top engineering colleges in the world, namely IIT Roorkee. After graduation in 2011, he worked for Oracle Financial Services and contributed to their next generation banking software. Then he worked as a freelancer for three years and built enterprise software for global clients, before starting BlueSapling. The team of BlueSapling mostly consists of graduates of the aforementioned institute and are really smart engineers.
 
We believe in the pursuit of perfection through continuous improvement, transparency, and integrity.  These are our core values while guide us to deliver excellent enterprise-grade solutions.
